def isPrime(n):
    if n==2 or n==3: return True
    if n%2==0 or n<2: return False
    for i in range(3,int(n**0.5)+1,2):   
        if n%i==0:
            return False    
    return True

N = int(raw_input())

i = N

while True:
    a = str(i)
    b = a[::-1]
    if a == b:
        if isPrime(int(a)):
            print a
            break
    i += 1
